{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = Embedded ARM System on Module |caption2 = w/ WLAN and Bluetooth connectivity |pp = https://www.digi.com/products/embedded-systems/system-on-modules/connectcore-for-i-mx6ul |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Digi |model = ConnectCore 6 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = UL |revision = (i.MX6) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = development board, wireless embedded board |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = MCQ-CCIMX6UL |icid = 1846A-CCIMX6UL |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Freescale (NXP);i.MX6UL;MCIMX6G, 2CVK05AA, 1N52P, CTAE623K, i.MX6UL UltraLite NXP i.MX6UL-2 (ARM Cortex-A7) @528MHz; |cpu1_cores = 1<!-- 1 --> |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A7 |cpu1spd = 528<!-- 900 / 696 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CC128M16FP-DII; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |eth3chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |eth4chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:04:F3 |oui = 00:04:F3
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 (OTG w/ PHY pins) |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = <!-- VDC,VAC, or POE, --> |pwr_vdc = <!-- DC Volts --> |pwr_amp_dc = <!-- DC Amps --> |pwr_vac = <!-- AC Volts --> |pwr_ac_hz = <!-- AC Hertz --> |pwr_amp_ac = <!-- AC Amps --> |pwr_poe_type = <!-- Type of POE --> |pwr_poe = <!-- POE Volts --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = <!-- Connector Type --> |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth 4.2, DFS (slave), |addchip = PMIC;NXP;PF3000;;1; ,,, Ultra-low Power MCU;NXP;KL03P24M48SF0;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 06/12/2017 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA6564A;Q, QCA6564A, 3VV, ANPN288, E752807; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |rad1ac = 433 |rad1n = 150/150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ''Digi International Inc.'' CCIMX6UL
===Specifications=== :;Digi ConnectCore 6UL (256-256-W-BT) *CPU: [[NXP]] i.MX6UL-2 (ARM Cortex-A7) @528MHz *Flash: 256MB/1GB (NAND), RAM: 256MB/1GB (DDR3) *MCA/MCU: [[NXP]] KL03P24M48SF0 (''Kinetis KL03'') :Ultra-low Power MCU @48MHz (ARM Cortex-M0+) <!-- *APPLICATION PROCESSOR NXP i.MX6UL-2 (ARM Cortex-A7) @528MHz :128 KB L2 cache, with NEON MPE (Media Processor Engine) :co-processor and programmable smart DMA (SDMA) controller *MEMORY 256 MB / 1 GB NAND flash, 256 MB / 1 GB DDR3 *VIDEO/GRAPHICS 2D Pixel Processing Pipeline (PXP) for color-space conversion, :scaling, alpha-blending, and rotation, 8- /16- /18- /24-bit parallel LCD Display :up to WXGA (1366x768), 8- /10- /16- /24-bit Parallel CSI with BT.656 support *SECURITY** AIS-31 compliant TRNG, ECC/AES256/TDES/ RSA encryption/decryption co-processor, :SHA-1/224/256, FameXE PKI co-processor with 4096-bit RSA,/544-bit ECC/ ECDSA support, Secure RTC, :Secure JTAG, Secure Storage, Secure Key Management, SPA/DPA/DFA (power/timing/fault attack protection), :Tamper Monitor, Digi TrustFence Embedded Security Framework *PERIPHERALS/INTERFACES 1 x dedicated MMC 4.5/SD 3.0/SDIO Port (1-/2-4-bit), 2x USB 2.0 OTG with PHY, :3x I2S/SAI, 1x S/PDIF Tx/Rx, 2x FlexCAN (2.0b), 4x I2C, 4x SPI, 7x UART, 4x Timer, 8x PWM, :3x Watchdog, 2x 12-bit ADC (10 channels) with 4-wire/5-wire touch controller, up to 103 GPIOs *EXTERNAL BUS 16-bit address / up to 16-bit data (multiplexed and non-multiplexed modes) *ETHERNET Dual 10/100 Mbit Ethernet MAC + IEEE 1588 *WIRELESS 802.11a/b/g/n/ac 1x1 (MCS 0-9), Bluetooth 5.0 with strong :WPA2-Enterprise authentication/encryption for Wi-Fi connections *MCA MICROCONTROLLER ASSIST Ultra-low power (ARM Cortex-M0+) :up to 48 MHz (NXP Kinetis KL03: KL03P24M48SF0) *PMIC NXP PF3000 -->
==See also== *[[Digi ConnectCore 6 Plus]] (CC-WMX-KK8D-TN)
[[Category:English Documentation]]
